entry.data:
MOSTLY CLEAR
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 40S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTH AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

SHOWERS, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A 30 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
LOWS AROUND 40

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
A 30 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S

SHOWERS LIKELY
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
HIGHS AROUND 60
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT
